description:
Author Stephen King has built quite the reputation over the decades. His works include countless novels, screenplays, and other iconic projects that have contributed to various different genres and artforms over the years. Nevertheless, one social media user that entered an argument with Stephen King suggests that he needs to “get a job.” It’s an [...]

title: Stephen King Argument Goes Viral Online

description:
Before Bill Skarsgård was cast as The Crow in the upcoming movie reboot, many different actors were in talks to play Eric Draven at some point. One of which was Jason Momoa – who even screen tested for the role for a film that was going to be directed by Corin Hardy. The movie ended [...]

title: Test Footage Of Jason Momoa as The Crow Resurfaces
